Imports

geometry_primitives, term_buf

Types

Shape = ref object of RootObj
Multishape = ref object of Shape
  shapes: seq[Shape]

SLine[T; Num] = ref object of Shape
  start: Point[Num]
  length: Num
  angle: Radian
  config: T

SPoint[T; Num] = ref object of Shape
  point: Point[Num]
  config: T

RectPoint = enum
  rpoLeftEdge, rpoRightEdge, rpoBottomEdge, rpoTopEdge, rpoTopLeft, rpoTopRight,
  rpoBottomLeft, rpoBottomRight
SRect[T; Num] = ref object of Shape
  start: Point[Num]
  height: Num
  width: Num
  config: T

TermRectConf = Table[RectPoint, ColoredRune]
TermRect = SRect[TermRectConf, int]
SText[Num] = ref object of Shape
  start: Point[Num]
  case reflow: bool
  of true:
      text: string
      maxWidth: Num
      maxHeight: Num

  of false:
      lines: TermBuf

  
GridPoint = enum
  gpoIntersection, gpoTopLeft, gpoTopRight, gpoBottomLeft, gpoBottomRight,
  gpoLeftBorder, gpoLeftIntersection, gpoRightBorder, gpoRightIntersection,
  gpoTopBorder, gpoTopIntersection, gpoBottomBorder, gpoBottomIntersection,
  gpoHorizontalGap, gpoVerticalGap
SGrid[T; Num] = ref object of Shape
  start: Point[Num]
  cellWidths: seq[Num]
  cellHeights: seq[Num]
  config: T

TermGridConf = Table[GridPoint, ColoredRune]
TermGrid = SGrid[TermGridConf, int]
TermMultiGrid = SMulticellGrid[TermGridConf, int]
